author: Kent Taylor
text:
As a member of the City of Casa Grande Heritage Commission we have been asked to assist the City with a definition of "Death in the line of duty"  The City recently dedicated a new memorial for employees who died in the line of duty, and recognized two employees.  It was brought to the attention of staff that another employee died while at work.  This employee died while playing basketball at lunch.  
I would appreciate any examples of existing policies that defines what "death in the line of duty" means.
title: Policy for "Employee death in the line of duty"
